Reviews.Content: Got the camera and was everything I expected and more, it also came a day earlier than expected too.  The best part is it originally stated it did not have the charging cord and I was ready to go buy one but when it showed up it had a charger. so I am one very pleased customer.

Reviews.Title: Runs through batteries like candy
Reviews.Author: C. Lamb
Reviews.Content: Camera is fine for the money but it consumes the battery it almost no time.  We have to keep the battery out of the camera until its time to take the pictures and then remove it quickly if it is going to be more than 30 min before the next pics or the battery will be dead!

Reviews.Title: it's okay
Reviews.Author: cactus
Reviews.Content: the picture quality is okay, sometimes it focuses on the wrong things and I'm not sure how to do everything manually. The video is terrible.

Reviews.Title: slow ........
Reviews.Author: justafan
Reviews.Content: Sony usually make good electronics but this is their 2nd camera that I'm disappointed with. This one has slow processor. It takes few seconds for it to process the picture taken. I know this is an inexpensive camera but that is yesterday's technology. recently I went on a walking tour where you pretty much have to take quick snap shots and move on. This camera couldn't keep up. It's ok if you have all day to take photos. This is not a camera to snap pictures quick. I'm in the process of shopping for a new camera. Can't stand the slow response of this Sony Cybershot.

Reviews.Title: Very convenient, good quality for nonprofessional use
Reviews.Author: Janis
Reviews.Content: I did try several other brands like Canon, Olympus and Fujifilm. When I bought my Sony Alpha I was so happy with it that my next purchase was Sony Cyber-Shot for travelling. Absolutely sufficient for an amateur.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: JOSE ENRIQUE GUERRA SALAZAR
Reviews.Content: The purchase resulted without any problems and just what was described would be sent was received, was tested and liked

Reviews.Title: MUUUY BUENA CAMARA
Reviews.Author: Knelo
Reviews.Content: Excelente camara, muuuy buena camara, excelente ZOOM, no esperaba menos de la marca, los videos en HD se ven nitido, justifica el precio pagado

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for indoor pics
Reviews.Author: TDB
Reviews.Content: Ive been using it for a few months now and it is a great little camera. It takes perfect pic inside with and without flash. Outside pics are also great. It dont take to long to take the pic, great reviews and easy to download. I replaced my kodak for this and I am so glad.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice
Reviews.Author: Palls53
Reviews.Content: Photos are good and with excellent clarity and look very neat.I purchased two of them, for me and for husband's friend.Everyone liked and appreciated my choice of choosing this model.Videos also look great.. Easy to carry and lots of space with 4GBProDuo memory stick.Taking photos is real fun..

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!
Reviews.Author: Denise Nykiel "Snowbound"
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to take to Italy on vacation, and it was perfect!  I took a little over 2000 pictures and the quality was fantastic, the camera size is great for carrying, plus it is so easy to use.  I highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: For the money, this is a great camera. Much better quality than the old camera. I love the zoom. It gets real close and clear crisp pictures. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Shellie Hartschen
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I have had it for several months now. I don't use it as often as I would like, butthe features are wonderful. However, sometimes you have tip the camera a certain way in order to focus.Overall, a wonderful product.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Harold M. Harless
Reviews.Content: Got this camera after much research.  Amazon provided the best deal around and we have been very please with the camera.  The dealer was prompt and we got exactly what we expected.  Great deal.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Pictures
Reviews.Author: Kevin Munge
Reviews.Content: This camera has lasted through many a sporting event and concert thus far and it takes the best pictures Ive ever seen for a non SLR type camera.

Reviews.Title: My wife likes it
Reviews.Author: Robert  Allen Myers
Reviews.Content: small, easy to use and a good zoom lens  if the wife is happy,  I am happy.  would recommend it

Reviews.Title: a birthday hit
Reviews.Author: L. Oberlin
Reviews.Content: art student daughter loves it! has a lot of extras and computer compatible for assignments. a rare hit for birthday gifts

Reviews.Title: BUENA CAMARA
Reviews.Author: Nelson Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: BUENA CAMARA TIENE FUNCIONES ERSCECIONALES LO RECOMIENDO LAS FOTOS LA TOMA MUY BUENA  TANTO DE DIA COMO DE NOCHE Y MUY BUENA LOS PIXELES

Reviews.Title: Sony Quality is going down - Bought 3 digital cameras and all broke...
Reviews.Author: globetrotter
Reviews.Content: I'll preface this review by saying that I'm a lifelong Sony customer.  I've purchased their products for years.  TVs, DVD players, digital cameras, video cameras, etc.  Before, you bought a Sony and you could depend on a quality product, typically lasting forever.  Those days seem to be gone.I purchased 3 Sony digital cameras for my family and myself.  Last Christmas I gave my mother in law this camera.The quality has gone way down. ALL 3 of these cameras broke including a brand new DSC-H90 that we bought.  All had the same problem.  The screen just goes black.  The same thing happened to all of them so obviously there is some major design flaw.Fortunately on all of them I saved the receipt and they were all under warranty.  I sent them in to the Sony repair center in Houston, Texas.  I have to say I was not pleased with how long it took to get it back.  My last one that I sent in, it took a very long time and communication was poor.  I was dealing with Mr. Vargas out of the Houston repair center.  He told me the parts to fix it were on back order so he said they would send a new camera upgrade.  Only to tell me the next day to forget it and the parts will come in and they would send the old one.I emailed him to tell him my disappointment that ALL 3 Sony cameras I bought in the last year all had the same problem and he admitted that there was a design problem with the motherboard and the engineers were working on it in Japan.The frustrating part is that my camera was in repair and I didn't have it for a vacation so I had to rush out and buy a new digital camera for the trip.  I bought the DSC-H90 and believe it or not, that camera too is having the same problem with the screen going black!Sony should do a major recall on ALL of their digital cameras that are affected by this "design flaw".  It was extremely inconvenient to have to go out and buy a new camera because it took too long to fix.

Reviews.Title: HATE IT
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera before my son could walk. Other than it was really slow to take the next picture it was just okay. Now I have a two yr old and he is constantly running and EVERY photo is blurry. If you try to use the "action" mode then the flash doesn't work- so don't even bother trying to take an indoor photo. I spend way too much money on it considering I miss all the good moments because it takes too long to take the next photo and ANY action photo is blurry. I like my old Kodak easy share. NOT A GOOD CAMERA FOR EVEN THE SLIGHTEST ACTION PHOTO.

Reviews.Title: Exelent Camera
Reviews.Author: Silvino Salas "Salas"
Reviews.Content: is amazing this camera has very good definition pictures are excellent have to CHOOSE megapixel capacity depends how you want is a bit heavier than the cyber shot 14 mp good write me back if you want to know about this camera is barely competent to hear music background but I can not find how to do that function, this 100% recommended exellent I writing from mexico Take care greetings to all

Reviews.Title: Good when it worked
Reviews.Author: Mariah
Reviews.Content: Don't make the mistake of buying this camera used like I did. For about two months it worked fine. The picture quality was great, the lens worked fine, the zoom was good, everything was fine and dandy. Then one day I turned on the camera and the lens wouldn't focus. I was afraid to mess with it in case I made it worse, I tried a few things to fix it and one thing did. The internet said to hold the "menu" button down while turning it on and it worked! About two weeks later I went to a concert and once again the lens wouldn't focus which was disappointing because I had been looking forward to taking lots of pictures there. I tried holding down the menu button again but it did nothing. I had never dropped the camera, or hit it, or had it anywhere near water. I couldn't return it because I bought it used online. If you get this camera, get it new. Hopefully you won't be disappointed like I was.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: Sridhar Devulapalli "Devulas"
Reviews.Content: I can take very good photos in 16:9 12M resolution and videos with 720 fine resolution. Zoom is very good.

Reviews.Title: Dust bunny
Reviews.Author: G. Sunstrom "islandrunner"
Reviews.Content: I like the camera and all of the features but the dust inside the lense is horrible and requires returning to a service center to correct.  I use this camera for documenting home inspections and there is so much dust inside the lens that I can no longer use the photos.  Dust bunnies are not great but allowable under the bed but not acceptable in a camera!

Reviews.Title: nice camera for normal people
Reviews.Author: Heather B
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to Korea, because I couldn't find my old one. I'm super happy with this purchase! I took it to a Norah Jones concert in Central park yesterday, and got amazing shots from near the back (and video too). I have shaky hands which leads to blurry pics, but not with this camera. The stability function is great. I was taking great shots at full, digital, zoom with one hand above my head. I've also gotten some of the best shots of my dog. The resolution is so good (even zooming across the room) that you can even see her whiskers. The timing between pressing the button and the picture capture is quite fast, and something that was lacking in my old Fuji FinePix.People who are super into photography might be let down, but then what do they really want in a point and shoot?

Reviews.Title: Review of Sony Cybershot DSC-H70
Reviews.Author: Sanu
Reviews.Content: Awesome product from Sony. Clarity of the pictures taken are quite good.Different modes make it most effective in various sorroundings. Its 10X optical zoom is the most I like in this price range.

Reviews.Title: super camera, especially for the price
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: i bought this to replace the same model camera i dropped and broke. for the price, this camera is terrific. i was able to photograph a nest of woodpeckers, 50 feet up in a tree, as a parent fed a chick...the quality of the pictures i got was amazing....a great little camera!

Reviews.Title: great for grandpa
Reviews.Author: azpics
Reviews.Content: This is great, low price, great lens, and captures the kids playing basketball in doors is perfect.The fact this fits in my pocket and has a battery is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-H70 Review
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: Camera was a gift for my daughter, she was thrilled.  Easy enough to use right out of the box, charged it up, popped in an SD card and started taking pictures.  Great optical zoom.  I was a little disappointed in the color, as the soft rubber part does not match the body of the camera exactly.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: quimpy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace a kodak easyshare that was 6-7 years old.  I took it on vacation and was amazed at how great the pictures looked and when I transferred them to my computer to resize I was very pleased with the results.  I think for the money this is a great camera.  I am not a professional photographer but you can take some nice photos that your not ashamed to show off.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera! Passed the test!!
Reviews.Author: Anna Rojas
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS CAMERA! I put it through the ultimate test, a Live concert, and I must say it exceeded my expectations! It corrects photos that would otherwise be unrecognizable! I love that you can zoom in and out while shooting a video without getting blurry. The photos come out very clear with bright colors, and the video and audio quality is amazing compared to other cameras!! It seems to filter the sound, making it a much more enjoyable experience. I compared my videos to others taken that night with other cameras and there's an incredible difference!! Great price too!Check out one of my videos here: [...]

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Mark Wallig "Mark W"
Reviews.Content: This is the third I've purchased after one stolen and one dunked in the ocean.  The best feature is the 10X zoom.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera // Fantastic price!
Reviews.Author: Daddy's Tweety
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera. Easy to use. Great price. I purchased my original Sony camera 12 years ago, so tough to pick a new one with so many to choose from.  I made the right choice!

Reviews.Title: Hugely Disappointed With Fish-eye Pictures.
Reviews.Author: Metrostar
Reviews.Content: The lens in this camera is bloody awful and results in pictures that curve at the edges. It's called the fish-eye effect I believe. Do not buy this camera if you want beautiful pictures that you want to hang around the house. People will think you took them on a kids toy camera.On the other hand, the video is pretty good and the audio is pretty good at not distorting with loud noises. It's only at 64kbps though, so dont expect great audio. But if you want to make videos at a rock concert, you will be really pleased with the sound remaining clear.Video Example: [...]

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: rbp
Reviews.Content: Absolutely Amazing Camera .Affordable price and exceptional quality . Highly recommended.Really compact but does the job very well .The 16MP resolution is enough to capture some wonderful memories

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera, I love
Reviews.Author: Miguel Azuaje
Reviews.Content: I'm in love with this sony pictures are excellent and also the videos, has a huge screen, the zoom is great, I'm very happy for my purchase! Buy this camera

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Tangee Bradley
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it. It is very easy to use and it has a long battery life. We are very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: perfect for family
Reviews.Author: Lika
Reviews.Content: Works perfect and the quality is very high, its not profesional, but very good for this price, takes best pictures at the day time, and its a sony )))

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Lean One "Lean Leader"
Reviews.Content: We have been very pleased with this camera.  It takes clear pictures and is simple to use.  The pictures are used in PowerPoint presentations.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: PatD
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera thats takes AWESOME pics and is easy to use. You will not go wrong buying this camera for all of your video and picture needs.

Reviews.Title: Awesome HD video!!!
Reviews.Author: L. Crocker
Reviews.Content: The flash on our 14mp cybershot stopped working and we wanted to upgrade. Perhaps we should've used only Sony batteries. That may or may not have been the cause.  I bought a cheapie battery online because we love to take videos and definitely need an extra battery.  Anyway, I read another review that said they could hear the zoom motor when they were recording, but we like to record loud concerts and the audio is excellent! Here is an example of one we recorded with our new 16mp cybershot H70 ...[...]It was loud, we used the zoom, and it came out perfectly. Am very pleased with this camera.It does take a few seconds to take another picture, but we mostly care about the video. And I have noticed that it is faster when your battery is fully loaded and I think it makes a difference if you have a faster SD card.  Currently just have a little 2GB card and it takes a few seconds to snap the next pic.In conclusion ... it's an awesome little camera, but you will need an extra battery to record more than 30 mins. and faster SD card for quicker pics.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Walter Vargas Navarro "Walter Vargas"
Reviews.Content: This camera is a very nice and chip Sony Cybershot, very usefull and portable. Perfect for people who just want to take pictures sometimes about familly or landscapes without worry. With the 16.1 mp and the 10 x optical zoom is enough for no professional people.

Reviews.Title: The image quality is OK for the price
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: The camera is great for this price. Although the image quality taken by the camera is not very well.Btw, it's a little heavy.

Reviews.Title: It's a snap
Reviews.Author: Barbie
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an easy to use camera with tons of features.  Compact, light and a striking red makes this camera a winner.  Panoramic  scenery, auto flash,  zoom and many more. This camera is a dream

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: maxmm7860
Reviews.Content: This is a great Camera, purchased without knowing what to expect.  Takes great pictures, fast on focus and easy to manuver from screen too screen.....great quality for the money!!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber Shot DSC-H70
Reviews.Author: ML "ML"
Reviews.Content: Really good camera. It is Small, light and good quality for pictures. Easy to use. Good purchase. Highly recommended. I love it.

Reviews.Title: great bundle
Reviews.Author: metallicafan
Reviews.Content: great camera, used it a few times already. Great price for what comes with the bundle pack. Definitely would recommend to others who are looking for a good quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: MaryBastidas
Reviews.Content: It is more than i was expected!! it has many characteristic that make your pictures perfect even when there's no light.. in one word is awesome

Reviews.Title: a little disappointed
Reviews.Author: Tomas D. Zamora "Latin Man"
Reviews.Content: I'm a little disappointed with the camera because there are somethings on it that I don't like.First the camera don't have the option macro manually.Secondly when I press the play button the screen shows a small distortion to that side, what worries me because it can damage.However, the camera takes very good pictures even in low light.The panoramic option is very good but the resolution of the picture is low.And finally the camera is a bit slow to display images.I recommend best buy in a store where you can test the product and all its functions.

Reviews.Title: excellent picture quality in a fairlysmall camera. love it!

Reviews.Content: I'm pretty picky about photo quality and I usually have to adjust auto exposure camera photos with a program. I don't have to do that with this camera. It is also small enough to carry in my purse. It is fairly easy to operate and the quality of the photos is excellent. I highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Ferdinand Legaspi
Reviews.Content: This was the first camera I bought and I feel very satisfied with it. It looks chic because of the color and the screen is wide enough. The 10x zoom is also good. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot is a great camera!
Reviews.Author: Patricia M. Robles
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this camera but would suggest that Sony provide written instructions for the many great functions of the camera.  While the in-camera menu is extensive, it would be extremely helpful to be able to read an instruction booklet at leisure and learn these functions.  If there is a way to print something like this from the CD that came with the camera I would very much appreciate learning how to do this.  Slowly but surely my grandchildren are instructing me on its usage! Signed: "Technically challenged senior."

Reviews.Title: Great for a price.
Reviews.Author: Milos
Reviews.Content: Was not sorry once I got it. I  talked  with my friend who also bought it. Great for a price ($160.) Great zoom which  works in video mode too.Sweep panorama works great for memorable  shots.  Easy to use even in low light. Love wide angle shots. From arms length you can take self portrait pics of entire family.

Reviews.Title: Not a very good choice...kind of OK
Reviews.Author: Amit
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product after i saw the reviews, there were quite a few review and telling good things about this camera.After using this I am little disappointed, the shutter speed of camera is very low, it will try to take 2 shots for each image which is really terrible and takes lot of time. the image quality varies with each click, sometimes it will be really good and sometimes it is real bad even worse them a VGA camera of any mobile.If you try to take a snap while travelling in a car, the image quality is not very stable. it takes little long to adjust its focus.I will suggest to choose any other product over this camera.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Happy Traveler
Reviews.Content: WE PURCHASED THIS CAMERA AND IT  HAD PROBLEMS THE FIRST TIME WE USED IT. SENT IT IN FOR SERVICE, EVEN THOUGH IT WAS UNDER WARRANTY, WE HAD TO PAY FOR SHIPPING. THE CAMERA WAS RETURNED TO US , CLAIMING IT HAD BEEN REPAIRED WHICH IT HAD NOT. AGAIN WE SENT IT IN WITH PICTURES SHOWING THE PROBLEM, AGAIN SONY CLAIMS THERE IS NO PROBLEM WITH THE CAMERA, IT MUST BE US NOT HOLDING THE CAMERA STEADY. WE ARE ADULTS, WHO HAVE OWNED NUMEROUS CAMERAS, INCLUDING THE CANNON WE CURRENTLY USE FOR MY HUSBANDS HUNTING TRIPS, WHICH TAKES BEAUTIFUL PICTURES. WE REGRET NOT STICKING TO CANNON AND WASTING OUR MONEY ON A CAMERA THAT DOESN'T WORK.

Reviews.Title: Product good, did not meet my expectations
Reviews.Author: Jean Collins
Reviews.Content: When I received the camera it didn't zoom as much as I had hoped.  Will probably buy a different one.  The shipping was great and so was the return.  I haven't yet received my credit card bill on the camera but I was notified by Amazon promptly that the return was received and credited on my card

Reviews.Title: a disappointment
Reviews.Author: bobt
Reviews.Content: Purchased a cybershot DSC H70  ~2 years ago as an "upgrade" to buying Canons...Lots of resolution which is nice but images had to be reduced in size to be emailed..."Fancier" camera with large zoom range but within warranty time, the lens cover cap wouldn't close....  We had it repaired which took ~mo or two and then recently the same thing happened !!.....  We handle our cameras carefully and this is very frustrating. Nowadays my smart phone may satisfy our needs.... otherwise back to Canon!!

Reviews.Title: Great resolution, but camera is too small
Reviews.Author: Peter Miller "Peter"
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything it is suppose to do. Great high resolutionphotos, and very good zoom lense. But if you are use to holding and handlinglarger cameras, this camera takes some getting use to. I think they made the unititself TOO SMALL.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera...........
Reviews.Author: HBL
Reviews.Content: Received camera today and am very pleased with the looks of it. One thing---it does not come with a SD card. Set up is easy and screen is great. Haven't taken any pics yet but expect it to be very good. My son has one and he loves it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camer
Reviews.Author: J. C. Ryan
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera from another vendor.  My wife and I took it abroad to Italy and I fell in love with Italy and the camera (I was already madly in love with my wife).  I lent it to my daughter who took it to China and dropped it.  I got a much better deal on the replacement camera from Amazon and I still love the camera.

Reviews.Title: another great sony product......
Reviews.Author: anne67
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera before Christmas, and I've been a camera addict since then. If you are shopping for a new camera, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Caro Lina
Reviews.Content: Good priced Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-H70. It arrived within the time promised. This camera takes great pictures. I highly recommend buying one!

Reviews.Title: Not what i expected
Reviews.Author: V & F
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as an upgrade but it's not much of an upgrade when the pictures appear somewhat pixelated. I read some reviews stating the same problem but I still decided to buy it. I guess for the money it's an ok product, but i was just expecting a little more quality on the pictures. The zoom is not that great either, but the only thing i like about this camera is the video, and the software it comes with, it organizes all your pictures really well.After months of use, now I can say that I like the camera a lot more. I learned to get better pictures with it and now I'm satisfied with my purchase. It's not a high quality camera but It's a nice camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!! simply amazing!
Reviews.Author: Juan Agustin Chavarria Valdivia
Reviews.Content: The best camera i ever had!!! The zoom, the quality of the picture are incredible!! When i take a picture in the dark or a video

Reviews.Title: It's a great camera but optical zoom is so so
Reviews.Author: M. Neri
Reviews.Content: I love the features of this camera. It captures great pictures and it's user friendly. I didn't give a 5 star because I am not satisfied with the zoom or probably it's just me who has this problem. When I tried to zoom it 10x it won't capture steady. I don't know if there's something I need to do. It would turn blurry and the subject is hardly recognizable. But overall this is a great product.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: goheelsgal
Reviews.Content: I'm strictly a point and shoot kind of person and this camera is all that I will ever need. Easy to use. Beautiful panoramic shots. Cons are few and easy to forgive. #1 is it ain't blue! It's purple. Initially the controls on top felt awkwardly placed but became comfortable after a few uses. I used it extensively one day at the Grand Canyon and the battery was dead by the end of the day. Overall I am very happy I choose this camera.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures. Owner's manual is a joke.
Reviews.Author: Harris P.
Reviews.Content: Powers-up and is ready to take pictures fast. Good optical zoom lens. Takes great point & shoot pictures. Video clips look so-so. Will not work with non Sony generic batteries unlike earlier Sony Cybershot cameras. The owner's manual does not have near enough detail. I had to dig down through layers of undocumented software settings in the camera to find out why I had no sound when playing back video clips.

Reviews.Title: nice for the price
Reviews.Author: boogieman
Reviews.Content: nice camera-lotsa useable features,but does take some getting used to.very good low light indoor shots,but some reds become exaggerated when compared with the object,not a dealbreaker considering the detail you get but worth mentioning.i take alot of close-up,detail oriented shots for internet sales use,and it's very handy for that.i like the auto lens cover.zoom works well.did alot of research for cameras under $300,and decided on this,and have not been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Sony h70
Reviews.Author: paulochain
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. Have a nice experience with this CAMERA!! From Barranquilla Colombia. I think that wide photos have a little resolution but we can enjoy this article.

Reviews.Title: Is a very good Digital Still Camera
Reviews.Author: César
Reviews.Content: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-H70 16.1 MP Digital Still Camera with 10x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom G Lens and 3.0-inch LCD (Black)

Reviews.Title: EM
Reviews.Author: E. Mason "photographer"
Reviews.Content: I have 2 slr Sony cameras, (828 and @350) altough the H70 does not quite compare to them, I am amazed at the picture quality and sharpness. It is easy to use, colors are great. The best is the HD video. Software works fine in windows XP. I hav'nt used all of the features yet, still learning.

Reviews.Title: Super happy
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth D. Tornuff "Lisa T."
Reviews.Content: Got the camera, so happy with it, the speed of arrival and packing of product was really good.  The camera has great features and I love the built in camera use guide.  I love all of the features.  I couldn't be more pleased.  !

Reviews.Title: Cannot take photos higher than 6 MP.
Reviews.Author: Johnny
Reviews.Content: I had 3 Canon cameras before I bought Sony DSC-H70 a month ago. Have been taking good pictures with clear images and no blur. Simple to use and pictures came out better than Canon. Only one complain so far -it is suppose to be a 16.1 MP camera but I can never take photos that exceeds 6 MP. I tried changing the image size to the highest 4:3 16M, under many different lighting conditions such as bright day light, beach, indoor, outdoor but still cannot maximise the 16M as advertised.  Maybe I miss something. One big surprise is I can use my SD card too instead of Sony memory stick. Overall still a good camera.

Reviews.Title: inquiry
Reviews.Author: Capt.Ahab
Reviews.Content: i am planning to buy this camera for my wife but i just wanna know if this camera is made from japan? thanks

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Steve Corrier "Vic"
Reviews.Content: After looking around online, I found this to be a decent newer mode of camera well worth the price. I bought it as a gift for my sister, just something point-and-click for her to us in college, and she loves it!

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed!
Reviews.Author: Methni
Reviews.Content: I really wanted this camera since it promised 10x zoom and 16MP. Even if I read the technical problems pointed out in the reviews I neglected them and tried my luck expecting a working camera. Thanks to Amazon I got the camera delivered within 2 days but I was really dissapointed to see the camera was not switichin on even with fully charged battery.Technical problems I encountered are as follows:- Camera does not switch on when I press power ON button- Sometimes it switches on, but while taking photos it switches off automatically (but the lese doesn't go in), and camera will not respond to any further action. When this happens it is very hard to take the lense inside.I assume that there is a technical defect in this model. Please do not buy the camera since you will never know whether you will end up with an item which is not working...During the couple of minutes I got to check the image quality of the camera, I can say the quality is great in good lighting condition, OK quality in low light condition. Zooming at 10X is also good.Methni

Reviews.Title: Ken
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: This is a low end item but with a lot sony creative feature. I would recommand my friend to buy this again as a high optical zoom, travel camera

Reviews.Title: Owner's Manual-unable to print
Reviews.Author: G. T. Spigel "shutterbug"
Reviews.Content: I had a canon powershot A720IS which took great pictures and was pocket-sized. I wanted to upgrade the optical power from 6X to 10X or higher and have gone through several cameras that had poor picture quality. This camera took OK pictures but not as good as the powershot I had. The deal breaker was that the owner's manual was only in html format and not pdf so it could not be downloaded in its entirety-only 1 page at a time! The customer should have the option of downloading it if one so desires. The shorter instruction manual that now comes with all the cameras does not answer all your questions.

Reviews.Title: Algo de lo mejor en camaras a buen precio.
Reviews.Author: fabian
Reviews.Content: Es sorprendente la gama de camaras fotograficas que existe pero siempre he confiado en Sony, cuando adquiri mi camar no espere mucho y empece a disparar fotos, entonces me di cuenta de que el zoom en modo video, era algo de lo mejor que habia visto, con un zoom de 10X a una distancia de 150 yardas, funciona con mucho detalle y pense que no se veria bien en mi laptop y se ve de maravilla, la recomiendo por el precio y su rendimiento.

Reviews.Title: No battery! No data cable! No Manuals! No user's guide! Etc...
Reviews.Author: LUIS PEREZ
Reviews.Content: I received the "Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-H70" without: user's guide, manuals, battery charger, data cable, etc...**What's in the Box: digital camera and baterry. Only!So... I'm very disappointed!:(

Reviews.Title: muy buena y versatil.
Reviews.Author: gustavo
Reviews.Content: La camara es una buena opcion. ya que aunque no sepas mucho de fotografia, los modos automaticos te lo hacen todo facil y comprensible.Yo antes de esta camara tube un modelo sony dsc 500, y aunque la diferencia es grande, el modo de uso se hace familiar.  Me encanta el zoom, muy buenas tomas a 10x., que en conjunto con el estabilizador de imagenes, esas dos caracteristicas son geniales.  Me parece que hay un sin fin de nuevas funciones que hacen que la camara sea una buena opcion, ejemplo: detencion de sonrisas, barrido panoramico muy facil de usar, funcion antiparpadeo, deteccion de rostros, entre otros.  El nivel de sensibilidad a la luz desde mi modelo anterior a este nuevo a dado un salto gigantesco, y eso te ayuda a que todas tus fotos sean validas y no tengas que estar seleccionando para borrar fotos y quedar con unas pocas tomas.  No piedes fotos con esta camara, todas las tomas  son buenas.  Tambiem entre el precio en oferta, con la promocion de la memoria de 4 gb y el forro para guardarla, lo veo como un buen negocio a bun precio.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: I was a little disappointed in the color of the camera, from the picture it looks like the camera is very blue and when I received the camera, it looks more purple in person.  Other than that it is really easy to use and a really great camera.
